message.content: {"given_definition_quality":90,"better_definition":"tall; high (in height)","sentence":"他很高。","image_prompt":"A tall young man stands among a group of shorter people in an urban setting. The image should be in a soft apocalypse animation style, with soft lighting and slightly muted colors, giving a dramatic yet gentle atmosphere. The tall man should visually stand out by his height compared to others, possibly with light rays subtly highlighting him. The background shows subtle signs of an abandoned or changed city, but the focus is on the comparison of heights.","sentence_translation":"He is tall."}
